text:
Holly Riordan 17 Reasons Why đ đżđ đ˝đ đťđ đź He Suddenly â˛ Lost Interest đ ... 
Don't you hate when a #guy flirts with you for weeks, and then suddenly drops out of your life? 
When that happens, it's not your fault, so don't blame yourself. 
Here are a few potential reasons why he might've lost interest: 1. He Doesnât Want a Real Relationship 
Some men love to flirt, but aren't ready for anything serious. 
That's why they'll run the other way once they develop a real connection with someone.
